data.title: Adobe • Revenue of Adobe is $16.13 B
data.meta_description: Discover Global Company Information from Adobe. Access Adobe's Company Profile. Get Adobe's Revenue & Contact Data
data.text:
Adobe is a leading software company known for its creative and document management solutions. Adobe is headquartered in San Jose, California, United States.

How to use Business Intelligence from Adobe

BoldData can deliver 50+ different data fields from Adobe. From company name to address, revenue, contact data, email data, industry, employees, legal form and founding year. Start your research or sales and marketing campaign to Adobe or any other industry with our company database of all 310 million companies worldwide in 2,000 industries. The main data sources of our company database are Chamber of Commerces, Financial Reports, Statistics Offices and other public sources in 200+ countries. Ask a quote via the contact form and buy your custom-made list today!

Adobe Key financial highlights:

Revenue: Adobe’s revenue is primarily influenced by its software products, including Adobe Creative Cloud, Adobe Document Cloud, and Adobe Experience Cloud, as well as its subscription-based business model and customer adoption of its digital media and marketing solutions, it has reported 16.13 billion U.S. dollars in revenue.

Profit: One of the biggest challenges for Adobe to stay profitable is the competitive software market, which requires continuous innovation and customer engagement to maintain its market leadership. Adobe has historically maintained a considerable net income of 4.83 billion U.S. dollars.

Adobe’s assets include a diverse portfolio of software products, intellectual property, data centers, and financial investments, among other assets. Adobe has reported 25.98 billion U.S. dollars in assets.

Adobe’s market value in the software market is determined by factors such as its revenue, profitability, growth prospects, competitive position, and investor sentiment, all of which influence the stock price and market capitalization. Adobe current market value is 193.1 billion U.S. dollars.

Financial data from Adobe or other companies is available in Excel, Bulk Dataset or API and can be tailored to your needs by our data experts. Ask a quote via the contact form and buy your custom-made list today!

Number of companies owned by Adobe

Adobe has 147 subsidiaries in 30 countries. The majority of companies that are owned by Adobe are based in United States of America (78 companies). Second is India with 15 companies in Adobe’s control (10%). Adobe also owns many companies in United Kingdom : 6. These three countries combined are home to 67% of all companies that are owned by Adobe.

Company information with group structure from Adobe or all 300 million companies worldwide is available in Excel, Bulk Dataset or API and can be tailored to your needs by our data experts. Ask a quote via the contact form and buy your custom-made list today!
